content.en: Soil Moisture Algorithms: Scientists have been studying the accuracy and performance of different algorithms used to measure soil moisture through remote sensing. They compare these algorithms to ground-based measurements and land surface models to determine how well they work. The algorithms mentioned include Advanced Microwave Scanning Radiometer E (AMSR-E), Common Land Model (CLM), Soil-Vegetation-Atmosphere Transfer (SVAT) model, and many others.
content.da: Jordfugtighedsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt nøjagtigheden og præstationen af forskellige algoritmer, der bruges til at måle jordfugtighed gennem fjernmåling. De sammenligner disse algoritmer med jordbaserede målinger og landoverflademodeller for at afgøre, hvor godt de fungerer. De nævnte algoritmer inkluderer Advanced Microwave Scanning Radiometer E (AMSR-E), Common Land Model (CLM), Soil-Vegetation-Atmosphere Transfer (SVAT) model og mange andre.
